MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a unplanned power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Caergeiliog and surrounding areas. Our engineers are on site to repair a faulty transformer and 2 grounded overhead lines. Extra engineers have also arrived on site to assist with repairs and are still working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00AM on 9th November 2020.
